(A1 → G).natural: If the company presents hybrid corn, then the expo is a profitable event.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the company presents hybrid corn or the company demonstrates an irrigation system.

(A11 → A12).natural: Provided that the regulator approves GMO corn, the regulator restricts GMO corn.

(A11 → ¬A12).natural: Whenever the regulator approves GMO corn, it is not the case that the regulator restricts GMO corn.

(A11 ∨ G).natural: The regulator approves GMO corn or the expo is a profitable event.

(A16 → A15).natural: Given that the farmer networks with suppliers, the farmer learns new techniques.

(A19 → A20).natural: Provided that the farmer sees a drone demonstration, the farmer is impressed by drone technology.

(A19 → G).natural: Whenever the farmer sees a drone demonstration, the expo is a profitable event.

(A2 → G).natural: In the event that the company demonstrates an irrigation system, the expo is a profitable event.

(A20 → G).natural: Should the farmer be impressed by drone technology, the expo is a profitable event.

(A22 → G).natural: Given that the expo is a successful event, the expo is a profitable event.

(A23 → A22).natural: If the expo is a well-attended event, then the expo is a successful event.

(A24 → ¬A11).natural: Provided that the government bans GMO corn, it is not the case that the regulator approves GMO corn.

(A25 → A26).natural: Whenever the government funds the expo, the government sponsors the expo.

(A25 ∨ (A24 → ¬A11)).natural: Either the government funds the expo or, if the government bans GMO corn, then it is not the case that the regulator approves GMO corn.

(A3 → A15).natural: If the farmer attends the expo, then the farmer learns new techniques.

(A3 → A16).natural: Should the farmer attend the expo, the farmer networks with suppliers.

(A3 → A19).natural: In the event that the farmer attends the expo, the farmer sees a drone demonstration.

(A3 → A4).natural: Given that the farmer attends the expo, the farmer purchases equipment.

(A3 → G).natural: Provided that the farmer attends the expo, the expo is a profitable event.

(A4 → G).natural: Whenever the farmer purchases equipment, the expo is a profitable event.

(A5 → (A3 → A4)).natural: If the farmer is interested in sustainability, then, should the farmer attend the expo, the farmer purchases equipment.

(A7 → (A3 → A4)).natural: Given that the farmer has a high budget, whenever the farmer attends the expo, the farmer purchases equipment.

(A8 → A23).natural: Should the association organize the expo, the expo is a well-attended event.

(A8 → G).natural: In the event that the association organizes the expo, the expo is a profitable event.

(¬(A11 → ¬A12) → A13).natural: If it is not the case that, if the regulator approves GMO corn, then it is not the case that the regulator restricts GMO corn, then the lab tests GMO corn.

(¬(A16 → A15) → A17).natural: Provided that it is not the case that, if the farmer networks with suppliers, then the farmer learns new techniques, the farmer is satisfied with the expo.
